channel.title: Canadian Border Patrol
channel.description: The realest, fake border agency in North America
channel.itunes:subtitle: The realest, fake border agency in North America
channel.itunes:summary: Ryan is Canadian. Jordan is American. Together, they explore strange and interesting bits of Canadian culture.
channel.itunes:author: Jordan Rhea; Ryan Oldford

item.title: Canadian 90s Playlist (Part 1)
item.description: Jordan and Ryan investigate Spotify's Canadian 90s playlist, and go deep in the grunge mines.
item.content:encoded:
Jordan and Ryan investigate Spotify’s Canadian 90s playlist, and go deep in the grunge mines.

  • Moment of Canadianness: Refugee children enjoying snow for 1st time

  • Spotify’s Canadian ’90s playlist

    • Great Big Sea’s cover of “End of the World”
    • Other band facts sourced from the Wikipedia articles for each group
  • Check out Punch Up The Jam!

Thanks to The Motorleague for our theme song “North America” from their album Acknowledge, Acknowledge!

]]>
item.itunes:subtitle: Jordan and Ryan investigate Spotify's Canadian 90s playlist, and go deep in the grunge mines.

item.title: Heritage Minutes (Part 2)
item.description: Jordan and Ryan continue investigating the Heritage Minute PSAs, and Jordan discovers the true nature of Canadian history.
item.content:encoded:
Jordan and Ryan continue investigating the Heritage Minute PSAs, and Jordan discovers the true nature of Canadian history.

  • My Heritage Minute Playlist

    • Sourced from articles by Justin McElroy (not that one)

      • The 10 Best Canadian Heritage Minutes of All Time
      • Ranking Every Canadian Heritage Minute: #25-11

Thanks to The Motorleague for our theme song “North America” from their album Acknowledge, Acknowledge!

]]>
item.itunes:subtitle: Jordan and Ryan continue investigating the Heritage Minute PSAs, and Jordan discovers the true nature of Canadian history.

item.title: Heritage Minutes (Part 1)
item.description: Jordan and Ryan are investigating Canada's televised nuggets of history, the Heritage Minute PSAs.
item.content:encoded:
